metadata.title: CVE-2024-45751 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: tgt (aka Linux target framework) before 1.0.93 attempts to achieve entropyby calling rand without srand. The PRNG seed is always 1, and thus thesequence of challenges is always identical.

criterions.comment: tgt package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
